name: Space Honey
description:
• Annihilate hordes of enemies while listening to cool techno-trap soundtrack
  • 20 enemy waves
  • Starting easy and going to the bullet hell
  • 7 automatic level-ups (movement speed, fire speed, magnets for honey, etc)
  • Super-power with slow-motion
  • Collectible power-ups (health, shield, wings, eagle eye)
  • Hazards
  • etc ...

Have Fun.

Use WASD + mouse

My second game. 

All music, sounds and textures are free to use, as I know. Text me if I'm wrong.

Music:

Powerful Trap Beat | Strong by Alex-Productions | https://onsound.eu/
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
